phrase: I’ve been putting a few more miles on the bike each day… my knees have been killing me, just more in the last three or four days
swelling… redness… inflamed in the morning
no other joints bothering you… just the knees
no fever, chills, abdominal pain, nausea, or vomiting
coronary artery disease… stent placed last year
taking aspirin every day… no problems with Crestor
lupus… been in the background… no issues with kidney function
bilateral edema and slight erythema… slight effusion present on the knee
pain to palpation of the knee… decreased range of motion bilaterally
knee x-ray… no boney abnormality, no fracture
EKG… looks really good, no concerns from a heart standpoint
concerned that it might be from a flareup of your lupus
order a lipid panel and another echocardiogram
